original: de la mchod pa dag gzi brjid bskyed pa byas pa ni byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: de la mchod pa dag gzi brjid bskyed pa byas pa ni byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: The worship of that is the generation of splendor, which is the consecration.

original: 'di lta bu'i 'khor no ni gshin rje gshed de //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i 'khor no ni gshin rje gshed de //
translated: The retinue of this kind is Yamantaka.

original: 'dod pa'i don dang / de'i bar du gcod pa sel ba'am /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don dang / de'i bar du gcod pa sel ba'am /
translated: The desired aim is the removal or destruction of the obstacles to that.

original: 'joms pa ste go rims so //
analyzed: 'joms pa ste go rims so //
translated: This is the order.

original: gzhan yang rnam pa gsum gyis na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam pa gsum gyis na /
translated: Moreover, by three aspects,

original: dgu ru dbye ba byas pa dang bshad pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgu ru dbye ba byas pa dang bshad pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: the division into nine is completed and the explanation is finished.

original: rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa 'dod pa nyid de /
analyzed: rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa 'dod pa nyid de /
translated: The desired form is the cause, the method, and the result.

original: de'i phyir bshad pa lnga pa nyid do zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa lnga pa nyid do zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, the explanation is just the fifth.

original: 'di la las kyi bye brag gis bskyed pa'i 'khor lo bris pa dag la bstim pa dang / 'khrul 'khor bskyed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'khor dag bskul ba ni bstan pa'i rim pa ltar ro //
analyzed: 'di la las kyi bye brag gis bskyed pa'i 'khor lo bris pa dag la bstim pa dang / 'khrul 'khor bskyed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'khor dag bskul ba ni bstan pa'i rim pa ltar ro //
translated: Here, the dissolution into the drawn wheels generated by the particular action, the generation of the machine, and the urging of the desired retinue are according to the stages of the teaching.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis //
translated: All the bodhisattvas

original: dam tshig rab tu skyong ba yin //
analyzed: dam tshig rab tu skyong ba yin //
translated: He is one who keeps the commitments well.

original: zhes pa ni khro bo rnam pa bcu gnyis po kun gyis las byed pa las mi'i don no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni khro bo rnam pa bcu gnyis po kun gyis las byed pa las mi'i don no //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse: “All the twelve aspects of wrathful activity are performed by him.”

original: da ni ma grub pa ni 'dis spogs par bya ba ste /
analyzed: da ni ma grub pa ni 'dis spogs par bya ba ste /
translated: Now, the unaccomplished is to be accomplished by this.

original: snga ma'i dam tshig bskul @145b pa ltar //
analyzed: snga ma'i dam tshig bskul @145b pa ltar //
translated: As the former commitment is urged,

original: zhes pa lhag pa'i lha'i sngags kyi mjug la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa dag brjod la de'i mthar bskul ba brjod do //
analyzed: zhes pa lhag pa'i lha'i sngags kyi mjug la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa dag brjod la de'i mthar bskul ba brjod do //
translated: the mantra of the excellent deity is recited together with the homage at the end. At the end of that, the urging is recited.

original: de nas gzhan dag sngar gyi dang mtshungs par bya ba'am med par yang rung bar bshad do //
analyzed: de nas gzhan dag sngar gyi dang mtshungs par bya ba'am med par yang rung bar bshad do //
translated: Then, the others are to be done as before, or not, as explained.

original: bdag nyid nges par 'chi /
analyzed: bdag nyid nges par 'chi /
translated: One’s own death is certain.

original: zhes pa sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas par 'dod na de'i tshe 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas par 'dod na de'i tshe 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one wishes to do this without having done the prior approximation, then it will not be accomplished at that time, but will be exhausted.

original: gzhan yon tan te /
analyzed: gzhan yon tan te /
translated: The other is the quality.

original: las sna tshogs 'grub par bshad de go sla'o //
analyzed: las sna tshogs 'grub par bshad de go sla'o //
translated: It is explained that various activities are accomplished, which is easy to understand.

original: gsang pa rab tu bstan pa yin //
analyzed: gsang pa rab tu bstan pa yin //
translated: The secret is taught in full.

original: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i bskul ba bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i bskul ba bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the urging of the secret wheel is taught.

original: snying po phyag rgya ni bcu bdun po'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: snying po phyag rgya ni bcu bdun po'i sgrub thabs so //
translated: The essence seal is the means of achievement of the seventeen.

original: be con zhes pa phyag rgya dgu'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: be con zhes pa phyag rgya dgu'i sgrub thabs so //
translated: The club is the means of achievement of the nine seals.

original: snying po rang gis zhes pa ni be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags kyi bsnyen pa bya'o //
analyzed: snying po rang gis zhes pa ni be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngags kyi bsnyen pa bya'o //
translated: The essence itself is the recitation of the mantra of the club seal.

original: rtsa ba'i rtog pa be con gyi sgrub pa dang / de'i las bskul ba bsdus te bshad pa le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rtog pa be con gyi sgrub pa dang / de'i las bskul ba bsdus te bshad pa le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: The fourth chapter is the explanation of the root tantra, the achievement of the club, and the recitation of its activity.

original: // / de ltar le'u bzhi par bskul ba bstan pa la de'i sgrub pa dgos pas de bstan pa'i phyir /🔽de nas yi ge bcu bdun pa'i //
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u bzhi par bskul ba bstan pa la de'i sgrub pa dgos pas de bstan pa'i phyir / de nas yi ge bcu bdun pa'i //
translated: Thus, in the fourth chapter, the recitation is taught. Since its achievement is necessary, in order to teach that,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then, of the seventeen syllables,🔽the root mantra is the essence of the club.”

original: rtsa ba'i sngags zhes pa ni rang gi lugs brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags zhes pa ni rang gi lugs brjod pa yin la /
translated: The root mantra is the statement of one’s own system.

original: 'dir yang de bzhin te aa aa nutpa te zhes pas don dam pa'i bden pa gsungs la khro bo zhes pa ye shes te rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang de bzhin te aa aa nutpa te zhes pas don dam pa'i bden pa gsungs la khro bo zhes pa ye shes te rang bzhin no //
translated: Here also, it is the same. “ A a nutpāte” declares the ultimate truth. “ Wrathful” is the wisdom, the nature.

original: de'i las ni phrin las te /
analyzed: de'i las ni phrin las te /
translated: Its activity is the activity.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs ni sprul pa ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs ni sprul pa ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The various forms are emanations, which are the conventional truth.

original: yang na aa ni rang gi sems kyi gzhon pa lta bu'i ngo bo khyab pa'i gnas la gsungs te rnam par shes pa gzhan dang rlung gzhan mdag gi rgyu ba'i phyir rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: yang na aa ni rang gi sems kyi gzhon pa lta bu'i ngo bo khyab pa'i gnas la gsungs te rnam par shes pa gzhan dang rlung gzhan mdag gi rgyu ba'i phyir rtsa ba'o //
translated: Or else, a is said to be the nature of one's own mind, like a child, the all-pervading abode, the root, because it is the movement of other consciousnesses and other winds.

original: de yang rnam par smin pa yang yin la gzung ba'i yul yang yin te man ngag gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam par smin pa yang yin la gzung ba'i yul yang yin te man ngag gis shes par bya'o //
translated: That is also the result of maturation and the object to be apprehended, to be understood through instruction.

original: sngags zhes pa la sngags ni sprul la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags zhes pa la sngags ni sprul la sogs pa'o //
translated: As for mantra, mantra is emanation and so forth.

original: de yang mgo can dang / mgo med pa dang / mjug can dang / mjug ma med pa ste ming ngo //
analyzed: de yang mgo can dang / mgo med pa dang / mjug can dang / mjug ma med pa ste ming ngo //
translated: That is also with a head, without a head, with a tail, and without a tail, the name.

original: gtogs pa dang sod pa ni /
analyzed: gtogs pa dang sod pa ni /
translated: Belonging and killing

original: yid skyob pa dang / don ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: yid skyob pa dang / don ni dgos pa'o //
translated: are the mind's protection and the purpose.

original: skyob pa'i phyir zhes pa dang / stobs la sogs pa 'thob par byed pa'i nges tshig go //
analyzed: skyob pa'i phyir zhes pa dang / stobs la sogs pa 'thob par byed pa'i nges tshig go //
translated: As for for the sake of protection, it is the definition of attaining power and so forth.

original: de yang byang chub kyi phyogs ni sngags so //
analyzed: de yang byang chub kyi phyogs ni sngags so //
translated: Moreover, the factors of enlightenment are the mantra.

original: stong pa nyid ni mi mnyam pa dang nyam pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni mi mnyam pa dang nyam pa'i sngags so //
translated: Emptiness is the mantra of the unequaled and the equal.

original: khyad par gyi lam ni bar chad med pa'i phyir @146a * //
analyzed: khyad par gyi lam ni bar chad med pa'i phyir @146a * //
translated: The special path is mantra because it is uninterrupted.

original: sngags so // der rnam par grol ba mthar phyin pa ni mdzad pa chen pos sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir sngags so zhes bshad do //
analyzed: sngags so // der rnam par grol ba mthar phyin pa ni mdzad pa chen pos sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir sngags so zhes bshad do //
translated: There, the ultimate perfection of liberation is mantra because it acts for the sake of sentient beings with great deeds.

original: yang / lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa yi //
analyzed: yang / lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa yi //
translated: Moreover,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i yi ge aa //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i yi ge aa //
translated: The syllable A, which is innate,🔽Resides at the base of the navel.

original: khong nas byung yang skye ba med //
analyzed: khong nas byung yang skye ba med //
translated: Though it arises from within, it is unborn.

original: yi ge kun gyi rtsa ba'i phyir //
analyzed: yi ge kun gyi rtsa ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is the root of all syllables,

original: rtsa ba'i sngags su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags su shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be known as the root mantra.

original: zhes pa gdams dag go //🔽de yi phyag rgya gzhan dag kyang //
analyzed: zhes pa gdams dag go // de yi phyag rgya gzhan dag kyang //
translated: This is the instruction.

original: ro langs zhes ni bya ba yod //
analyzed: ro langs zhes ni bya ba yod //
translated: Its other mudrā is called the vetāla.

original: ces pa la de'i zhes pa sngags de'i'o //
analyzed: ces pa la de'i zhes pa sngags de'i'o //
translated: Here, “its” refers to the mantra.

original: sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan no //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan no //
translated: This is another method of practice.

original: de yang ro'i sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ro'i sgrub pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is the practice of the corpse.

original: snying ni dga' byed gsang ba'o //
analyzed: snying ni dga' byed gsang ba'o //
translated: The heart is the secret that delights.

original: zhes bya ba ni ro langs kyi phyag rgya 'dis thugs sad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ro langs kyi phyag rgya 'dis thugs sad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because this mudrā of the vetāla awakens the mind.

original: dur khrod dag ni thams cad ni //
analyzed: dur khrod dag ni thams cad ni //
translated: All charnel grounds

original: gang la rtag tu rag lus pa //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gang la rtag tu rag lus pa // zhes pa ni /
translated: who is the source of the charnel ground,🔽the one who is the source of the charnel ground’s power,🔽and the one who is the source of the charnel ground’s seal.

original: dur khrod ni ro la bya ste bdag med pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: dur khrod ni ro la bya ste bdag med pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The charnel ground is the corpse, which is the nature of selflessness.

original: de'i dngos grub ni de mthong ba dang / de'i shugs las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub ni de mthong ba dang / de'i shugs las byung ba'o //
translated: Its power is the vision of that, and what arises from the force of that.

original: de'i rag las pa ni de'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de'i rag las pa ni de'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The one who is the source of that is the seal of that.

original: rgyu'i phyir aa'i rnam pa'am sgyu ma'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir aa'i rnam pa'am sgyu ma'i rnam pa'o //
translated: Because it is the cause, it is the form of A or the form of illusion.

original: yang ril por 'dzin pa dang / rjes su gzhig pa yang mi 'da' ba'i phyir phyag rgya yin la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang ril por 'dzin pa dang / rjes su gzhig pa yang mi 'da' ba'i phyir phyag rgya yin la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is a seal because it does not transcend the state of being a whole and the state of being a part, and because it is dependent.

original: yang na dur khrod ni dbugs rgyu ba'i phyir lus yin te /🔽de'i shin tu sbyangs pa ni //
analyzed: yang na dur khrod ni dbugs rgyu ba'i phyir lus yin te / de'i shin tu sbyangs pa ni //
translated: Alternatively, the charnel ground is the body because it is the movement of the breath.🔽Its pliancy🔽is dependent on this illusory concentration.🔽The one who is the source of the charnel ground’s seal🔽is the one who is the source of the charnel ground’s power.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rag lus so //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rag lus so //
translated: The one who is the source of the charnel ground’s power🔽is the one who is the source of the charnel ground.🔽The one who is the source of the charnel ground🔽is the one who is the source of the corpse.🔽The one who is the source of the corpse🔽is the one who is the source of the charnel ground.🔽The one who is the source of the charnel ground🔽is the one who is the source of the corpse.🔽The one who is the source of the corpse🔽is the one who is the source of the charnel ground.🔽The one who is the source of the charnel ground🔽is the one who is the source of the corpse.🔽The one who is the source of the corpse🔽is the one who is the source of the charnel ground.🔽The one who is the source of the charnel ground🔽is the one who is the source of the corpse.🔽The one who is the source of the corpse

original: ro langs phyag rgya ldan pa de //
analyzed: ro langs phyag rgya ldan pa de //
translated: is the one who is the source of the charnel ground.🔽The one who is the source of the charnel ground

original: zhes pa yan chad ni sgra ji lta ba bzhin te gsal lo //
analyzed: zhes pa yan chad ni sgra ji lta ba bzhin te gsal lo //
translated: is the one who is the source of the corpse.🔽The one who is the source of the corpse🔽is the one who is the source of the charnel ground.

original: ha har gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: ha har gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: The one who is the source of the charnel ground

original: zhes pa ni ro'i sgrub pa gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni ro'i sgrub pa gsungs pa ste /
translated: is the one who is the source of the corpse.🔽The one who

original: de yang dang po lha gcig pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang / snying pos sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas la /
analyzed: de yang dang po lha gcig pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang / snying pos sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas la /
translated: First, one should perform the yoga of the single deity, and do the prior approximation with the essence mantra.

original: de nas ci rtse la sogs pa'i gnas yid du dga' bar zla ba mar do'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la dur khrod kyi rdzas gyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas pa'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad par bris la /
analyzed: de nas ci rtse la sogs pa'i gnas yid du dga' bar zla ba mar do'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la dur khrod kyi rdzas gyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas pa'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad par bris la /
translated: Then, in a place that is pleasing, such as a pleasure grove, on the eighth or fourteenth day of the waning moon, one should draw a square mandala with charnel ground substances. In the center one should draw an eight-petaled lotus.

original: de'i lte bar ro bri zhing de ru nyi ma'i gzugs bris nas /
analyzed: de'i lte bar ro bri zhing de ru nyi ma'i gzugs bris nas /
translated: In the center of that one should draw a corpse, and in that one should draw the form of the sun.

original: der rang gi rnal 'byor byas la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o //
analyzed: der rang gi rnal 'byor byas la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o //
translated: Having performed one's yoga there, one should make offerings and praises.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor du yang 'jam dpal bskyed la bdun rtsi lnga dang / sbos dang / mar me dang / dur khrod kyi me tog gis mchod do //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor du yang 'jam dpal bskyed la bdun rtsi lnga dang / sbos dang / mar me dang / dur khrod kyi me tog gis mchod do //
translated: Then, having generated Mañjuśrī in the mandala, one should make offerings with the five ambrosias, incense, lamps, and charnel ground flowers.

original: 'byung po la gtor ma yang byin la /
analyzed: 'byung po la gtor ma yang byin la /
translated: One should also give a sacrificial cake to the bhūtas.

original: de nas bum pa gcig tu khrag @146b dang / sha dang / tshil bu dang / bdud rtsi dang / sman blugs la /
analyzed: de nas bum pa gcig tu khrag @146b dang / sha dang / tshil bu dang / bdud rtsi dang / sman blugs la /
translated: Then, having poured blood, flesh, marrow, ambrosia, and medicine into a single vase,

original: dur khrod kyi ras kyis mgul pa bcing ngo //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi ras kyis mgul pa bcing ngo //
translated: One should bind one's neck with a cloth from a charnel ground.🔽Moreover, one should prepare the articles of worship: a sacrificial cake of human flesh, etc.,🔽a perfume of living water with a live frog,

original: gzhan yang mchod pa'i rdzas tshil chen po dang / sha la sogs pa'i lha bshos dang / srog chags chu chun dar btags pa'i bdug pa dang / dur khrod kyi sdong bu bdun ra'i gci bas bkrus la tshil chen po'i mar me btang bas mig sman du bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang mchod pa'i rdzas tshil chen po dang / sha la sogs pa'i lha bshos dang / srog chags chu chun dar btags pa'i bdug pa dang / dur khrod kyi sdong bu bdun ra'i gci bas bkrus la tshil chen po'i mar me btang bas mig sman du bya'o //
translated: and a lamp of human fat. Having washed a seven-knot stick from a charnel ground with urine and feces, one should make eye medicine with the lamp of human fat.

original: de nas bsrung ba'i cho ga gsungs pas bsrungs la /
analyzed: de nas bsrung ba'i cho ga gsungs pas bsrungs la /
translated: Then, having protected oneself with the rite of protection,

original: de nas rang shi ba ma rgas pa dang / nad med par ro de la dri chu dang bdud rtsi chen pos byug go //
analyzed: de nas rang shi ba ma rgas pa dang / nad med par ro de la dri chu dang bdud rtsi chen pos byug go //
translated: one should anoint the corpse with urine and the great elixir, without letting it become old or diseased.

original: dkyil 'khor kyi dbus su ro bzhag la ro'i snying gar bdag kha lho ru bltas te 'dug nas /🔽khyi'i 'o ma dang ba'i 'o ma'am /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor kyi dbus su ro bzhag la ro'i snying gar bdag kha lho ru bltas te 'dug nas / khyi'i 'o ma dang ba'i 'o ma'am /
translated: Having placed the corpse in the center of the maṇḍala, one should sit in the heart of the corpse, facing south.

original: sran ma dang / 'bras kyi chan dang / bdud rtsi dag dur gyi phru bar blugs te btsos pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sran ma dang / 'bras kyi chan dang / bdud rtsi dag dur gyi phru bar blugs te btsos pa'i tshe /
translated: One should cook rice, kidney beans, and the great elixir in a pot from a charnel ground with dog's milk and cow's milk.

original: thod pas kha bcad cing tshos pa dang / thod par stsal lo //
analyzed: thod pas kha bcad cing tshos pa dang / thod par stsal lo //
translated: When it is cooked, having covered it with a skull, one should serve it in a skull.

original: khar shing brtsigs la me sbar te drang por sbyin sreg bya ste /
analyzed: khar shing brtsigs la me sbar te drang por sbyin sreg bya ste /
translated: Build a pyre of charnel ground wood, light it, and perform the homa.

original: sngags brgya re zhing dbul te /
analyzed: sngags brgya re zhing dbul te /
translated: Recite the mantra one hundred times and offer it.

original: de lta bu'i brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
translated: Do this one hundred and eight times.

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal yum dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gshin rje mtha' yas pa dang / dur khrod kyi ce spyang dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu po dag sod sod kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang // srin po 'brug gi sgra bzhin sgrogs pa dag gis bskor bar bsam zhing /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal yum dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gshin rje mtha' yas pa dang / dur khrod kyi ce spyang dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu po dag sod sod kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang // srin po 'brug gi sgra bzhin sgrogs pa dag gis bskor bar bsam zhing /
translated: Imagine that Noble Mañjuśrī together with his mother, the retinue of limitless Yāmas, the jackals of the charnel ground, and the ten direction protectors all shout “Kill! Kill!” and that the rākṣasas roar like thunder.

original: lho phyogs nas grogs gcig gis bdug spos dang / dril bu rgyun du bsgrag go //
analyzed: lho phyogs nas grogs gcig gis bdug spos dang / dril bu rgyun du bsgrag go //
translated: From the south, one assistant should continuously offer incense and ring the bell.

original: de nas ro de langs nas bgyi ba ci 'dod ces gang 'dod ba ster ro //
analyzed: de nas ro de langs nas bgyi ba ci 'dod ces gang 'dod ba ster ro //
translated: Then, the corpse will rise up and say, “What do you want me to do?” It will give whatever is desired.

original: de'i tshe langs nas ha ha zhes dgod cing las gang 'dod pa gcig ster te /
analyzed: de'i tshe langs nas ha ha zhes dgod cing las gang 'dod pa gcig ster te /
translated: At that time, having risen up, it will laugh “ha ha” and give whatever task is desired.

original: sha za'i mchod sbyin du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: sha za'i mchod sbyin du bshad pa'o //
translated: This is explained as the offering of a flesh-eating spirit.

original: cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya //
translated: One should apply it according to the rite.

original: zhes pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of homa.

original: khro bo 'bar byed bshad par bya //
analyzed: khro bo 'bar byed bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain the blazing wrathful one.

original: zhes bya ba ni khro bo rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi las su bshad pa yang 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khro bo rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi las su bshad pa yang 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the rite of the twelve types of wrathful ones.

original: yi dags phal chen bshad pa bzhin //
analyzed: yi dags phal chen bshad pa bzhin //
translated: As in the explanation of the great ghosts,

original: 'di yang zhes pa ni ro langs bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang ngo //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes pa ni ro langs bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang ngo //
translated: this also refers to this maṇḍala of the rite of the vetāla.

original: khru brgyad lhag chad med par ni //
analyzed: khru brgyad lhag chad med par ni //
translated: Eight cubits, neither more nor less,

original: zhes pa ni dngos grub sna tshogs la khru brgyad pa 'dis shis so zhes pa gzhan dag ni go sla ste ma bshad do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dngos grub sna tshogs la khru brgyad pa 'dis shis so zhes pa gzhan dag ni go sla ste ma bshad do //
translated: this is auspicious for the various siddhis. The others are easy to understand and are not explained.

original: mchod par bya zhes pa lha la ste me lha la'o //
analyzed: mchod par bya zhes pa lha la ste me lha la'o //
translated: One should worship the deity, the fire deity.

original: gtor ma gsum pa zhes @147a * //
analyzed: gtor ma gsum pa zhes @147a * //
translated: The third bali

original: bya ba ni dang po'i rang gi rnal 'byor dang de'i gtor ma'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni dang po'i rang gi rnal 'byor dang de'i gtor ma'o //
translated: is the first one’s own yoga and its bali.

original: gnyis pa sbyin sreg gi dang / gsum pa yi dags la gtang ba ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa sbyin sreg gi dang / gsum pa yi dags la gtang ba ste /
translated: The second is the fire sacrifice, and the third is the oblation to the ghosts.

original: de la yang sha chen po dang / tshil dang / khrag dang / bdud rtsi lngas bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang sha chen po dang / tshil dang / khrag dang / bdud rtsi lngas bya'o //
translated: There, one should use great flesh, fat, blood, and the five elixirs.

original: bdug pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bdug pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: The incense is the same.

original: ro langs phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
analyzed: ro langs phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
translated: Having bound the zombie mudra,

original: gtor ma me tog la sogs dbul //
analyzed: gtor ma me tog la sogs dbul //
translated: offer the torma, flowers, and so on.

original: zhes pa ni khro bo'i phyag rgyas te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni khro bo'i phyag rgyas te /
translated: This is the mudra of wrath.

original: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'dis dam tshig mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'dis dam tshig mtshon pa'o //
translated: This is the mudra of one’s pledge, which is the sign of the pledge.

original: des bya ba kun la yang sbyor la ro langs pa la dam tshig gi phyir bstan par bya ba yin pas na ro langs so //🔽snying gar ro langs phyag rgya gzhag / ces pa 'jam dpal bzhugs par bsam pa'am /
analyzed: des bya ba kun la yang sbyor la ro langs pa la dam tshig gi phyir bstan par bya ba yin pas na ro langs so // snying gar ro langs phyag rgya gzhag / ces pa 'jam dpal bzhugs par bsam pa'am /
translated: It is applied to all activities. Since it is to be shown to the zombie for the sake of the pledge, it is the zombie.🔽Place the zombie mudra at the heart.

original: mtshan ma gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma gzhag pa'o //
translated: This is the thought of Mañjuśrī abiding or the placement of the sign.

original: aargha de la dbul bar bya //
analyzed: aargha de la dbul bar bya //
translated: Offer the argha to him.

original: zhes pa ni 'jam dpal ngo bo ro'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'jam dpal ngo bo ro'i rnam pa'o //
translated: This is the essence of Mañjuśrī in the form of a corpse.

original: gser du 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
analyzed: gser du 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
translated: There is no doubt that it will become gold.

original: zhes pa ni gser du 'dod na gser ram yung bas ro la byugs la snga ma bzhin nam /
analyzed: zhes pa ni gser du 'dod na gser ram yung bas ro la byugs la snga ma bzhin nam /
translated: If one desires gold, having anointed the corpse with gold or turmeric, as before,

original: sbyor ba gzhan du sbyar na'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba gzhan du sbyar na'o //
translated: one should apply it to another substance.

original: ro langs phyag rgya mi shes na /
analyzed: ro langs phyag rgya mi shes na /
translated: If one does not know the zombie mudra,

original: sems ni ji ltar drug gyur kyang //
analyzed: sems ni ji ltar drug gyur kyang //
translated: no matter how one acts,

original: zhes bya ba ni ro langs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di ro langs nas dngos grub ster ba la dgos pa'i rang gi rnal 'byor dang / me lha'i rnal 'byor dang / de'i mchod rdzas dang sngags rnams ni de'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ro langs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di ro langs nas dngos grub ster ba la dgos pa'i rang gi rnal 'byor dang / me lha'i rnal 'byor dang / de'i mchod rdzas dang sngags rnams ni de'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: One's own yoga, the yoga of the fire deity, and its offering substances and mantras are its mudra.

original: de ma shes par don 'grub pa med de /
analyzed: de ma shes par don 'grub pa med de /
translated: Without knowing that, the goal is not accomplished.

original: sa bon med par mi 'byung ba myu gu yin pa bzhin du sbyor ba 'di mi shes pa'i sngags pa sgra la ni zhen pa dang / lha'i de kho na nyid mi shes pa rten cing 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: sa bon med par mi 'byung ba myu gu yin pa bzhin du sbyor ba 'di mi shes pa'i sngags pa sgra la ni zhen pa dang / lha'i de kho na nyid mi shes pa rten cing 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: Just as a sprout does not occur without a seed, the mantra practitioner who does not know this yoga is attached to sound and does not know the reality of the deity, which is the two kinds of dependent origination.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid la yang dag pa'i kun rdzob tsam du yang 'di lha ma yin pa la /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid la yang dag pa'i kun rdzob tsam du yang 'di lha ma yin pa la /
translated: Also, the characteristics of form and so on are not the deity even as a mere correct conventionality.

original: don dam par lhar 'dod cing zhen pa dang / sgyu ma'i ngo bo 'di 'jam pa'i dbyangs su brtags pa'i rnal 'byor can gyis rtogs kyang sbyor ba bla ma'i ngag las blangs pa med cing mi shes na /
analyzed: don dam par lhar 'dod cing zhen pa dang / sgyu ma'i ngo bo 'di 'jam pa'i dbyangs su brtags pa'i rnal 'byor can gyis rtogs kyang sbyor ba bla ma'i ngag las blangs pa med cing mi shes na /
translated: One who is attached to the ultimate deity, and the yogin who imagines this illusory nature to be Mañjuśrī, if he does not take up the practice from the speech of the guru and does not know it,

original: sems pas byed kyang 'dod pa'i don 'byung ba med de /
analyzed: sems pas byed kyang 'dod pa'i don 'byung ba med de /
translated: even if he does the visualization, the desired aim will not arise,

original: mi shes shing nye bar ma byas pa'i phyir sa bon med pa'i myu gu bzhin no //
analyzed: mi shes shing nye bar ma byas pa'i phyir sa bon med pa'i myu gu bzhin no //
translated: because he does not know it and does not apply it, like a sprout without a seed.

original: des nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu la yang sa bzhin byed do //
analyzed: des nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu la yang sa bzhin byed do //
translated: By that, one can travel through space and also make water like earth.

original: gzhan go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o //
translated: The others are easy to understand.

original: da ni gzir ba la sogs pa ro langs kyi las gzhan @147b dag gsungs pa de bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gzir ba la sogs pa ro langs kyi las gzhan @147b dag gsungs pa de bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the other rites of the vetāla, such as the summoning, he says:

original: de nas gzhan yang ro langs kyis //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang ro langs kyis //
translated: Next, moreover, the summoning

original: gzir bar bya ba gsang ba bshad //🔽ces bya ba rgya cher smos te /
analyzed: gzir bar bya ba gsang ba bshad // ces bya ba rgya cher smos te /
translated: of the vetāla is explained.🔽In the skull cup, in the oil of great fat,

original: thod pa'i nang du tshil chen po'i mar khu la aa shva ra ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: thod pa'i nang du tshil chen po'i mar khu la aa shva ra ba zhes pa ni /
translated: the aśvarāji, that is, the horse hair,🔽is placed.

original: 'dir ka ra b'i ra'i shun lpags dang / ras kyi sdong bu byas la mar me dus ni zla ba'am /
analyzed: 'dir ka ra b'i ra'i shun lpags dang / ras kyi sdong bu byas la mar me dus ni zla ba'am /
translated: Here, one should make a wick from the outer bark of the karavīra and a cotton thread, and light the wick at the time of the full moon or the new moon.

original: nyi ma gzas zin pa'i tshe spar la de mthar bar sngags bzlas shing /
analyzed: nyi ma gzas zin pa'i tshe spar la de mthar bar sngags bzlas shing /
translated: At the end of that, one should recite the mantra while making smoke with the skull cap turned face down.

original: thod pa kha sbub pas dud par byas la des snag tshar byas te /
analyzed: thod pa kha sbub pas dud par byas la des snag tshar byas te /
translated: One should make ink with that.

original: ras bshus pa la 'khor lo bris la mar gyi tshes brgyad la ro snga ma bzhin du byas pa'i khar sbyin sreg du bya /
analyzed: ras bshus pa la 'khor lo bris la mar gyi tshes brgyad la ro snga ma bzhin du byas pa'i khar sbyin sreg du bya /
translated: One should draw the wheel on a cloth and offer the burnt oblation on the eighth day of the waxing moon in the mouth of the corpse as before.

original: mthar de yang bsregs na grub ste /
analyzed: mthar de yang bsregs na grub ste /
translated: If one burns it at the end, one will be successful.

original: man ngag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: man ngag las shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it from the oral instruction.

original: de yang na shing aarka'i bal kho na bsregs pa'i dud pa snag tshar byas pa /
analyzed: de yang na shing aarka'i bal kho na bsregs pa'i dud pa snag tshar byas pa /
translated: One should make ink with the smoke of the burnt cotton of the arka plant alone.

original: ro langs pa na mig la bskul na'o //
analyzed: ro langs pa na mig la bskul na'o //
translated: If one smears it in the eyes of a zombie, he will rise up.

original: slar thar par bya na snga ma bzhin la thar ba'i sngags kyis so //
analyzed: slar thar par bya na snga ma bzhin la thar ba'i sngags kyis so //
translated: If one wants to release him again, as before, with the mantra of release.🔽Then, moreover, “delusion”

original: de nas gzhan yang rmongs pa ni //🔽zhes byung ba rnams ni /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rmongs pa ni // zhes byung ba rnams ni /
translated: and so forth

original: snga ma bzhin la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin la /
translated: are as before.

original: rdzas 'di rnams ri lur byas la mar gyi tshes brgyad la sngags bzlas te /
analyzed: rdzas 'di rnams ri lur byas la mar gyi tshes brgyad la sngags bzlas te /
translated: Make these substances into pills, and on the eighth day of the waxing moon, recite the mantra.

original: snga ma bzhin ro'i khar gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin ro'i khar gzhag par bya ste /
translated: As before, place it in the mouth of the corpse.

original: de nas des 'khor lo yang dag par bris pa'i nang du ri lu bzhag nas sbas na rmongs par byed do //
analyzed: de nas des 'khor lo yang dag par bris pa'i nang du ri lu bzhag nas sbas na rmongs par byed do //
translated: Then, having written the wheel, place the pill inside it, and bury it.

original: ri lu bdun mthar bsregs la gcig gis bya'o //
analyzed: ri lu bdun mthar bsregs la gcig gis bya'o //
translated: Burn the seven pills at the end, and do it with one.

original: de nas gzhan yang dbab pa yi //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang dbab pa yi //
translated: Next, the supreme

original: zhes pa dag gsungs pa ni dbab pa'i sbyor bas gzhan las khyad bar du gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: zhes pa dag gsungs pa ni dbab pa'i sbyor bas gzhan las khyad bar du gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: is said to be supreme because it is superior to others by the practice of emission.

original: stag gi pags pa dang zhes pa ni na chung gi 'og gi gos so //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa dang zhes pa ni na chung gi 'og gi gos so //
translated: The skin of a tiger is the lower garment of a young woman.🔽The bark of a snake is black gugul.

original: sbrul gyi shun pa ni gu gul nag po ste rdzas de rnams dang / thang chu dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / tshil chen po rnams kyi ri lu thod par bsreg cing bdugs na 'bebs te thabs gzhan yang bya'o //
analyzed: sbrul gyi shun pa ni gu gul nag po ste rdzas de rnams dang / thang chu dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / tshil chen po rnams kyi ri lu thod par bsreg cing bdugs na 'bebs te thabs gzhan yang bya'o //
translated: If you burn and fumigate the pills of those substances, mercury, the five nectars, and great fat, in a skull cup, it will descend.

original: des smra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rtsed mo ston to //
analyzed: des smra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rtsed mo ston to //
translated: It displays the play of various kinds of speech.

original: gshegs pa'am gtang ba ni gur gum can bsregs te gtang ngo //
analyzed: gshegs pa'am gtang ba ni gur gum can bsregs te gtang ngo //
translated: The going or sending is the burning of the saffron-colored one.

original: dbang du byed pa dag gi mchog / rig pa 'dzin pa'i yid las byung //
analyzed: dbang du byed pa dag gi mchog / rig pa 'dzin pa'i yid las byung //
translated: The best of the subjugations is the mind-born of the knowledge-holder.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This is

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ba'o //
translated: arisen from the mind of Vairocana.

original: khro bo gtum po la sogs pa'i 'khor lo ltar byas la sngags bzlas na nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khro bo gtum po la sogs pa'i 'khor lo ltar byas la sngags bzlas na nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites the mantra while making the wheel of the retinue such as the wrathful Caṇḍa, one will certainly subjugate.

original: de nas khon pa las kyi ni //
analyzed: de nas khon pa las kyi ni //
translated: Then, the application of the rite of the wrathful one

original: sbyor ba 'ba' zhig bshad bar @148a * //🔽bya // zhes bya ba gsungs te //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'ba' zhig bshad bar @148a * // bya // zhes bya ba gsungs te //
translated: is explained as just the one.

original: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid /
analyzed: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid /
translated: The pacification and the very increase

original: zla ba yar gyi ngo la bya //
analyzed: zla ba yar gyi ngo la bya //
translated: are on the waxing moon.🔽The rites of power and violence,

original: dbang dang mngon spyod las dag dang // kho na dang bskrad dang gnas par dad //
analyzed: dbang dang mngon spyod las dag dang // kho na dang bskrad dang gnas par dad //
translated: the wrathful, the expulsion, and the abiding are on the waning moon.

original: dgug pa la sogs mar ngo la'o //
analyzed: dgug pa la sogs mar ngo la'o //
translated: The summoning and so forth are on the waning moon.

original: byang du kha bltas zhi ba la //
analyzed: byang du kha bltas zhi ba la //
translated: The pacification is facing north.

original: de bzhin rgyas la shar du blta //🔽drag po'i las la lho phyogs su //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyas la shar du blta // drag po'i las la lho phyogs su //
translated: The increase is likewise facing east.🔽The violent rite is in the south.

original: dbang gi las la nub tu blta //
analyzed: dbang gi las la nub tu blta //
translated: The rite of power is facing west.

original: gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs //
analyzed: gsod pa nyid la me yi phyogs //
translated: The killing is in the fire direction.

original: sdang bar bya la bden bral phyogs //🔽gnas las bskrad la rlung gi phyogs //
analyzed: sdang bar bya la bden bral phyogs // gnas las bskrad la rlung gi phyogs //
translated: For the rite of subjugation, the southwest direction;🔽for the rite of banishing, the northwest direction;

original: gnon pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs //
analyzed: gnon pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs //
translated: for the rite of repressing, the northeast direction;

original: zhi la kha dog dkar po ste //🔽rgyas pa dag la ser por bya //
analyzed: zhi la kha dog dkar po ste // rgyas pa dag la ser por bya //
translated: for the rite of pacifying, the white color;🔽for the rite of enriching, the yellow color;

original: dbang dang dgug pa dag la dmar //
analyzed: dbang dang dgug pa dag la dmar //
translated: for the rite of enthralling and summoning, the red color;

original: gsad la kha dog nag por bya //
analyzed: gsad la kha dog nag por bya //
translated: for the rite of killing, the black color.

original: byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la //
analyzed: byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la //
translated: For the rite of pacifying, with a mind of love;

original: dge ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la //🔽chags pa'i sems kyis dbang dag la //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la // chags pa'i sems kyis dbang dag la //
translated: for the rite of enriching, with a virtuous mind;🔽for the rite of enthralling, with a mind of passion;

original: khro bo'i sems kyis gsod pa la //🔽zhi ba phal cher srod la bya //
analyzed: khro bo'i sems kyis gsod pa la // zhi ba phal cher srod la bya //
translated: for the rite of killing, with a mind of wrath.🔽For the rite of pacifying, mostly at dusk;

original: rgyas pa phal cher snga dro bya //
analyzed: rgyas pa phal cher snga dro bya //
translated: for the rite of enriching, mostly in the morning;

original: dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las //
analyzed: dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las //
translated: for the rites of enthralling and assault,

original: nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed la //
analyzed: nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed la //
translated: at noon and midnight.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim la gnas pa yis //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim la gnas pa yis //
translated: One who abides in the stage of completion

original: nang gi dus la brten par bya //
analyzed: nang gi dus la brten par bya //
translated: should rely on the inner time.

original: 'gro ba'i snying la rab gnas dus //🔽rim ni go rims ji bzhin du //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i snying la rab gnas dus // rim ni go rims ji bzhin du //
translated: The time that abides in the heart of beings

original: thun phyed kyi ni dus su gnas //
analyzed: thun phyed kyi ni dus su gnas //
translated: is the half-period, abiding in sequence.

original: me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor te //
translated: Fire, wind, earth, water, and air are the individual maṇḍalas.

original: dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin ser //
analyzed: dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin ser //
translated: Red, black, and likewise yellow,

original: dkar po nyid de mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: dkar po nyid de mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: and white—in brief.

original: zhes dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad pa'i las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'dir yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bshad pa'i las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'dir yang sbyar ro //
translated: This is the explanation of the Bhagavān’s statement in the Śrī Guhyasamāja Tantra.

original: de'i rim pa ni rdzas de rnams la ri lu byas la /
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni rdzas de rnams la ri lu byas la /
translated: The procedure is as follows: Make pills from those substances.

original: zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe'i lu la sngags btab la /
analyzed: zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe'i lu la sngags btab la /
translated: When there is an eclipse of the moon, enchant the pills with the mantra.

original: khon par bya ba dag gi snying gar 'khor lo sbas la //
analyzed: khon par bya ba dag gi snying gar 'khor lo sbas la //
translated: Conceal the wheel in the heart of those to be killed.

original: tshes brgyad kyi nub mo ri lu khar bzhag la sbas na nges pa yin par ni mthu'i yon tan no //
analyzed: tshes brgyad kyi nub mo ri lu khar bzhag la sbas na nges pa yin par ni mthu'i yon tan no //
translated: If one places the pill in the mouth on the eighth night and conceals it, it is certain. This is the quality of power.

original: glang po che glad pa'o //
analyzed: glang po che glad pa'o //
translated: The elephant is the brain.

original: rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis la gnas pa dag la sdang ba gsad par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir de'i sbyor ba gsungs pa de bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis la gnas pa dag la sdang ba gsad par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir de'i sbyor ba gsungs pa de bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the killing of those who are hostile to the two types of yogins, the application for that is stated. In order to explain that,

original: gsod pa'i mchog ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: gsod pa'i mchog ni bshad par bya //
translated: the supreme killing is explained.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: mi gang dag gnod pa mang pos dkon mchog la gnod par byed pa dang / smod par byed pa'i log par lta ba dang / slob dpon la smod pa dang / mtshams @148b med pa byed pa la gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di bya'o //
analyzed: mi gang dag gnod pa mang pos dkon mchog la gnod par byed pa dang / smod par byed pa'i log par lta ba dang / slob dpon la smod pa dang / mtshams @148b med pa byed pa la gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di bya'o //
translated: This rite of killing should be done for those people who harm the Three Jewels with many harms, who have the wrong view of disparaging [them], who disparage the master, and who commit the crimes with immediate retribution.

original: rang la zhe sdang gi phyir kun la bya ba ni rang nyid la gnod pa skyed pa'o //
analyzed: rang la zhe sdang gi phyir kun la bya ba ni rang nyid la gnod pa skyed pa'o //
translated: Because of hatred for oneself, one should do it for all, producing harm for oneself.

original: byang chub sems dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: byang chub sems dang ldan pa la //
translated: For one endowed with the thought of awakening,

original: zhes pas / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa dang / rigs lngar grags pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pa dang / sems can kun la byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang / bzod pa dang / snying brtse ba dang 'brel bas 'grub kyi /
analyzed: zhes pas / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa dang / rigs lngar grags pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pa dang / sems can kun la byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang / bzod pa dang / snying brtse ba dang 'brel bas 'grub kyi /
translated: Endowed with the thought of awakening, endowed with the commitments renowned in the five families, endowed with love for all sentient beings, and connected with compassion, patience, and affection, [the rite] is accomplished.

original: de las bzlog pas mi 'grub ste //
analyzed: de las bzlog pas mi 'grub ste //
translated: It is not accomplished by the opposite of that.🔽With angry and violent conduct,

original: khro dang gtum pa'i spyod pa dang // zhe sdang gis gsad par 'dod pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: khro dang gtum pa'i spyod pa dang // zhe sdang gis gsad par 'dod pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: with hatred, desiring to kill, one is a tathāgata.

original: 'jam dpal gyi dngos grub dag dngos su mi 'grub kyi /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi dngos grub dag dngos su mi 'grub kyi /
translated: One should understand that the accomplishments of Manjusri are not actually accomplished,

original: rmi lam du yang mi 'grub po zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rmi lam du yang mi 'grub po zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: nor are they accomplished even in dreams.🔽In that process, one should take earth from the left and right footprints of an enemy,

original: de'i rim pa la dgra bo'i rkang pa g-yon pa dang // g-yas pa'i rjes zla ba stod dang smad kyi bye brag gis blangs pa'i sa dang / dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / rus pa dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / khrag dang / lan tshva dang /
analyzed: de'i rim pa la dgra bo'i rkang pa g-yon pa dang // g-yas pa'i rjes zla ba stod dang smad kyi bye brag gis blangs pa'i sa dang / dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / rus pa dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / khrag dang / lan tshva dang /
translated: earth from a charnel ground, charnel ground ash, bones, the five nectars, blood, salt,🔽donkey and camel dung, mustard seed, neem tree leaves, hair, great oil,🔽crow and owl excrement, feathers, wool, human bone powder,

original: bong bu dang / rnga mo'i spangs dang / skye tshe dang / shing nim pa'i lo ma dang / skra dang / mar khu chen po dang / khra dang / 'ug pa'i bshang ba dang / spu dang / gcing dang / mi'i rus phye dang /🔽ba spu ba dang / phub ma dag las gzugs brnyan byas la /
analyzed: bong bu dang / rnga mo'i spangs dang / skye tshe dang / shing nim pa'i lo ma dang / skra dang / mar khu chen po dang / khra dang / 'ug pa'i bshang ba dang / spu dang / gcing dang / mi'i rus phye dang / ba spu ba dang / phub ma dag las gzugs brnyan byas la /
translated: and human hair and nails.🔽One should make an effigy from these substances.

original: de'i lus la man ngag bzhin byas nas rlung gi dus sam /
analyzed: de'i lus la man ngag bzhin byas nas rlung gi dus sam /
translated: Having done that to the body according to the esoteric instructions, at the time of the wind,

original: nyin gung la rus pa dang tsher mas btsugs la gnas su bcug la ro langs khro bo'i sngags kyi mthar sv'a h'a spangs te h'um dang phat gnyis kyi dbus su ste /
analyzed: nyin gung la rus pa dang tsher mas btsugs la gnas su bcug la ro langs khro bo'i sngags kyi mthar sv'a h'a spangs te h'um dang phat gnyis kyi dbus su ste /
translated: At noon, having made him stand in a place where there are bones and thorns, he should be made to recite the mantra of the wrathful zombie, omitting svaha, and placing hum and phat in the middle.

original: de yang h'um phat kyi bar du de ba ta m'a ra ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing /
analyzed: de yang h'um phat kyi bar du de ba ta m'a ra ya zhes stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing /
translated: And he should recite the mantra “deva datta mara ya” one thousand and eight times between hum and phat.

original: mthar bsreg sam mnan par bya'o //
analyzed: mthar bsreg sam mnan par bya'o //
translated: In the end, he should be burned or buried.

original: de ltar byas na 'chi ba 'di la the tshom mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byas na 'chi ba 'di la the tshom mi bya'o //
translated: If one does it in this way, there is no doubt about his death.

original: bskrad pa'i las ni go sla'o //
analyzed: bskrad pa'i las ni go sla'o //
translated: The rite of banishing is easy to understand.

original: rtsod pa'i las la ba ra hi ni gu sha rnam gcig go zhes 'dir 'dod do //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i las la ba ra hi ni gu sha rnam gcig go zhes 'dir 'dod do //
translated: In the rite of dispute, it is asserted here that varahi is also gucha.

original: du tsir ni gi wang ngo //
analyzed: du tsir ni gi wang ngo //
translated: Dushira is costus root.

original: sman de dag dang / gzhan gang yin pa'i rdzas so //
analyzed: sman de dag dang / gzhan gang yin pa'i rdzas so //
translated: Those herbs and whatever other substances there are.

original: rdzas de rnams lo ma rlung gis btab bar zhes pa 'ug pa dang / bya rog gi sgro rang byi ba ste ma shi ba'i sgro dang so sor sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdzas de rnams lo ma rlung gis btab bar zhes pa 'ug pa dang / bya rog gi sgro rang byi ba ste ma shi ba'i sgro dang so sor sbyar ro //
translated: Those substances, “blown by the wind on leaves,” are the feathers of an owl and a crow, each separately applied to a living mouse.

original: byang chub rab zhugs zhes pa sems can la gnod pa dang phan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub rab zhugs zhes pa sems can la gnod pa dang phan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase who have entered enlightenment means for the sake of harming and benefiting sentient beings.

original: gzhan dag mos par bya ba'i phyir sprul pa sna tshogs bstan pa ni mig 'phrul lo //
analyzed: gzhan dag mos par bya ba'i phyir sprul pa sna tshogs bstan pa ni mig 'phrul lo //
translated: In order to inspire others, he teaches various emanations, which are magical creations.

original: de'i sbyor ba bstan @149a * //🔽pa'i phyir // de nas gzhan yang mig 'phrul gyi //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba bstan @149a * // pa'i phyir // de nas gzhan yang mig 'phrul gyi //
translated: In order to teach their application,🔽[the Bhagavān] declares,🔽Next, I will teach the procedure

original: cho ga tshul bzhin bstan par bya //
analyzed: cho ga tshul bzhin bstan par bya //
translated: of the rite of magical creation.

original: zhes pa dag ni gsal ba nyid las ma bshad do //
analyzed: zhes pa dag ni gsal ba nyid las ma bshad do //
translated: These are not explained in the Clear Elucidation.

original: da ni zhi ba'i las bshad de de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni zhi ba'i las bshad de de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the rite of pacification is explained. Therefore, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: de nas zhes pa la mig 'phrul pa de nas so //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la mig 'phrul pa de nas so //
translated: Next, after the magical creation,

original: sems can rnams kyi nad dang / 'chi ba nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi nad dang / 'chi ba nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: in order to pacify the sickness and death of sentient beings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nad med pa'i 'byor ba can du thugs dgyes pas zhi ba las kyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs te bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nad med pa'i 'byor ba can du thugs dgyes pas zhi ba las kyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs te bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: the Tathāgatas, who are delighted by the wealth of health, declare this application of the rite of pacification.

original: me tog dkar po zhes pa ni dri zhim po'i kha dog dkar po'o //
analyzed: me tog dkar po zhes pa ni dri zhim po'i kha dog dkar po'o //
translated: White flowers means fragrant flowers of white color.

original: de bzhin du sbos dang / gzhan yang dkar bar rnam par bsam mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbos dang / gzhan yang dkar bar rnam par bsam mo //
translated: Likewise, one should imagine that the other [impurities] are also white.

original: rgya mtshor 'gro ba chu'i nang du zhes pa chu chen po'o //
analyzed: rgya mtshor 'gro ba chu'i nang du zhes pa chu chen po'o //
translated: The water of the ocean is the great river.

original: der 'gro ba ni chu chung ba'o //
analyzed: der 'gro ba ni chu chung ba'o //
translated: The going there is the small river.

original: der ro longs kyi sngags bzlas shing dor bar bya ste /
analyzed: der ro longs kyi sngags bzlas shing dor bar bya ste /
translated: One should recite the mantra of the corpse and cast it into the water.

original: nad rnams lus las bton nas chur dor bar bsam mo //
analyzed: nad rnams lus las bton nas chur dor bar bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that the illnesses are removed from the body and cast into the water.🔽Then, the activities of increase are also

original: de nas rgyas pa'i las rnams kyang //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de nas rgyas pa'i las rnams kyang // zhes pa ni /
translated: Then, the activities of increase🔽This is saying...🔽

original: de la nad med pas lus rgyas pa dang / rnal 'byor pa mang pos longs spyod rgyas pa dang / tshe ring pos srog rgyas pa dang / mchod pa chen pos bsod nams dang / lam gyis ye shes mchog tu dang / thos pas shes rab rgyas te /
analyzed: de la nad med pas lus rgyas pa dang / rnal 'byor pa mang pos longs spyod rgyas pa dang / tshe ring pos srog rgyas pa dang / mchod pa chen pos bsod nams dang / lam gyis ye shes mchog tu dang / thos pas shes rab rgyas te /
translated: There, the body is increased by good health, enjoyments are increased by many practitioners, life is increased by long life, merit is increased by great worship, supreme wisdom is increased by the path, and wisdom is increased by learning.

original: de las skyes pa'am /
analyzed: de las skyes pa'am /
translated: One should imagine that the body is increased by those [activities].

original: bud med nad kyis lus ma rgyas na /
analyzed: bud med nad kyis lus ma rgyas na /
translated: If a man or woman is not increased by illness,

original: tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'am yang na ro langs kyi sngags kyi sku ser por bzhengs la mchod pa byas na nad dang bral te lus rgyas so //
analyzed: tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'am yang na ro langs kyi sngags kyi sku ser por bzhengs la mchod pa byas na nad dang bral te lus rgyas so //
translated: If one performs the rite of casting the tsa tsa or else one rises up the yellow body of the zombie mantra, and makes offerings, one will be free from illness and the body will be nourished.

original: mchod pa chen po yang byas nas /
analyzed: mchod pa chen po yang byas nas /
translated: Having also made great offerings,

original: de nas bla ma dang dge 'dun dang bram ze dag la chen pos bsngos na ma 'ongs pa'am /
analyzed: de nas bla ma dang dge 'dun dang bram ze dag la chen pos bsngos na ma 'ongs pa'am /
translated: then if one dedicates to the guru, the saṅgha, and the brahmins, one will have wealth in the future.

original: 'di la longs spyod rgyas so //
analyzed: 'di la longs spyod rgyas so //
translated: Or, one will have an increase of wealth in this life.

original: yang mchod pa byas nas ro langs kyi sngags bskul bas bzlas shing sngags phreng bar bzlas na tshe rgyas so //
analyzed: yang mchod pa byas nas ro langs kyi sngags bskul bas bzlas shing sngags phreng bar bzlas na tshe rgyas so //
translated: Having again made offerings, one should recite the zombie mantra, and if one recites the mantra garland, one’s life will be extended.

original: yang mchod pa mtha' yas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rdzas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa khengs pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: yang mchod pa mtha' yas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rdzas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa khengs pa rnams kyis /
translated: Again, with infinite offerings, all the wealth that is not left out or omitted, filling all the worlds of the ten directions without exception,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo rnams la phul zhing sngags bskul na bsod nams mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo rnams la phul zhing sngags bskul na bsod nams mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one offers to all the Tathagatas of the ten directions of the universe, without exception, to the noble Manjusri, to the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas and wrathful deities, and if one recites the mantra, one will increase one's merit infinitely.

original: yang lam bzhi ste /
analyzed: yang lam bzhi ste /
translated: There are four paths:

original: sbyor ba'i las nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi @149b drod dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang / chos kyi mchog dbang po dang / stobs dang bcas pas mthong ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes rgyas so //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i las nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi @149b drod dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang / chos kyi mchog dbang po dang / stobs dang bcas pas mthong ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes rgyas so //
translated: The path of application, which is the four stages of penetration, heat, summit, patience, and the supreme mundane qualities, together with the faculties and the powers, increases the knowledge of pure vision.

original: de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: This is fourfold:

original: dang po bar chad med pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
analyzed: dang po bar chad med pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni /
translated: The first is the acceptance of the knowledge of the teaching on suffering, which is uninterrupted.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal kyi spros pa bcad nas don myong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal kyi spros pa bcad nas don myong ba'o //
translated: Having eliminated the conceptual elaboration of the suffering of the desire realm, one experiences the meaning.

original: myong ba de nyid kyis khams gong ma'i spros pa bcad pa'i tshul gyis rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: myong ba de nyid kyis khams gong ma'i spros pa bcad pa'i tshul gyis rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: The acceptance of subsequent knowledge is the experience of that very object, which eliminates the elaborations of the higher realms.

original: bzod pa'i sbros pa med pa la //
analyzed: bzod pa'i sbros pa med pa la //
translated: The absence of elaborations of acceptance

original: zhes pa ni rjes su shes pa gnyis te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rjes su shes pa gnyis te /
translated: refers to the two subsequent knowledges.

original: de ni rnam par grol bar bsdus pa bstan te /
analyzed: de ni rnam par grol bar bsdus pa bstan te /
translated: This is the explanation of the inclusion of liberation.

original: de yang bden pa bzhi yin pas bzod pa bzhi yin la /
analyzed: de yang bden pa bzhi yin pas bzod pa bzhi yin la /
translated: Since there are four truths, there are four acceptances.

original: bzod pa bzhi'i grol ba yang bzhi yin pa'am /
analyzed: bzod pa bzhi'i grol ba yang bzhi yin pa'am /
translated: Liberation through the four acceptances is also fourfold.

original: yang na khams kyi bye brag gis bzod pa brgyad dang / shes pa brgyad du rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: yang na khams kyi bye brag gis bzod pa brgyad dang / shes pa brgyad du rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: Alternatively, the distinctions of the realms are classified as eight acceptances and eight subsequent knowledges.

original: des bsgom pa'i lam 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: des bsgom pa'i lam 'phel bar byed do //
translated: This increases the path of meditation.

original: de yang nges par na /
analyzed: de yang nges par na /
translated: Moreover, it is certain that

original: mthong ba'i lam de ni theg pa chen po pa bden pa so so la re mos dmigs pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam de ni theg pa chen po pa bden pa so so la re mos dmigs pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: the path of seeing is the Mahayana because it is not focused on the individual truths in a sequential manner.

original: bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid skad cig ma gcig gis dus la thog ma nyid du mthong ba ni /
analyzed: bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid skad cig ma gcig gis dus la thog ma nyid du mthong ba ni /
translated: The emptiness of the four truths is seen in one instant at the very beginning.

original: bar chad med pa'i lam sngar ma mthong ba'i don mthong bas na mthong ba'i ye shes te 'phags pa'i sar phyin par byed pa'i phyir lam mo //
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam sngar ma mthong ba'i don mthong bas na mthong ba'i ye shes te 'phags pa'i sar phyin par byed pa'i phyir lam mo //
translated: The path of no obstacles is the seeing of a meaning not previously seen. It is the seeing of pristine awareness. It is the path because it causes one to reach the level of a noble being.

original: bden pa'i don dang / bstan pa la shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir skad cig ma bcu drug dang / brgyad dang dgu la sogs par bshad do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab sde snod gsum po de la yang mngon pa'i snod de nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i nyan thos kyi theg pa /
analyzed: bden pa'i don dang / bstan pa la shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir skad cig ma bcu drug dang / brgyad dang dgu la sogs par bshad do // de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab sde snod gsum po de la yang mngon pa'i snod de nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i nyan thos kyi theg pa /
translated: In order to increase the wisdom of the meaning of the truths and of the teachings, the sixteen moments, eight moments, nine moments, and so forth are explained.🔽The scriptures spoken by the Tathāgata are the three scriptural collections.

original: theg pa chung du'i sde snod thos la /
analyzed: theg pa chung du'i sde snod thos la /
translated: The listeners and solitary realizers who are vessels for the Abhidharma listen to the scriptural collection of the Hearers’ Vehicle.

original: byang chub sems dpas chos mngon pa theg pa chen po'i mdo thos pas shes rab rgyas te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas chos mngon pa theg pa chen po'i mdo thos pas shes rab rgyas te /
translated: The bodhisattvas listen to the Abhidharma of the Great Vehicle, the sūtras of the Great Vehicle, and their wisdom increases.

original: de yang thos pa'i shes rab la brten nas /
analyzed: de yang thos pa'i shes rab la brten nas /
translated: Moreover, based on the wisdom of listening,

original: bsam pa'i shes rab ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bsam pa'i shes rab ces 'byung ngo //
translated: the wisdom of reflection arises.

original: rgyas par bshad zin to //
analyzed: rgyas par bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained in detail.

original: 'jig rten thams cad dgar 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad dgar 'gyur ba //
translated: It delights all the worlds.

original: dgar bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya //
analyzed: dgar bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya //
translated: The explanation of the secret will be given.

original: zhes pa gsungs pa ni sdud pa po'i tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa gsungs pa ni sdud pa po'i tshig go //
translated: This is the statement of the compiler.

original: gi wang ni glang po che'i go ro tsa na'o //
analyzed: gi wang ni glang po che'i go ro tsa na'o //
translated: The bovine bezoar is the elephant's bile.

original: yang na gi wang ni skye ba bdun pa'i snying kha na go ro tsa na yod pa ste /
analyzed: yang na gi wang ni skye ba bdun pa'i snying kha na go ro tsa na yod pa ste /
translated: Or else, the bovine bezoar is the bile in the heart of one who has been born seven times as a human.

original: rang gi khrag cas pa srin lag g-yon pa'i khrag dang bsres nas ro langs gyi khar gcug la /
analyzed: rang gi khrag cas pa srin lag g-yon pa'i khrag dang bsres nas ro langs gyi khar gcug la /
translated: One's own blood is mixed with the blood of the left ring finger, and it is placed in the mouth of a zombie.

original: ro langs kyi sngags @150a * //
analyzed: ro langs kyi sngags @150a * //
translated: One should incite the zombie with the zombie mantra.

original: kyis bskul la de nas zla ba shi ba'i tshe bsgrub na nges pa'o //
analyzed: kyis bskul la de nas zla ba shi ba'i tshe bsgrub na nges pa'o //
translated: Then, when the moon has set, it is certain.

original: yang na dga' ba ni ye shes te /
analyzed: yang na dga' ba ni ye shes te /
translated: Or else, the joy is the intuition.

original: de rang la skyes pa ni yod pa'o //
analyzed: de rang la skyes pa ni yod pa'o //
translated: Its arising in oneself is its existence.

original: de yong pa'i thabs ni phyag rgya la yod pa'i gsang ba'i padma'i bde ba gi wang dang / rang gi thabs kyi gsang ba sbyar la bdag gi dpral ba ste sbyi bor gnyis ka'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyi thig les rtse gnyis su bsres na dga' ba skye ste sbas pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yong pa'i thabs ni phyag rgya la yod pa'i gsang ba'i padma'i bde ba gi wang dang / rang gi thabs kyi gsang ba sbyar la bdag gi dpral ba ste sbyi bor gnyis ka'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyi thig les rtse gnyis su bsres na dga' ba skye ste sbas pa'i don to //
translated: The means of its arising is the method of the secret of the lotus of the seal, the bovine bezoar, and the secret of one's own method. If one mixes the two natures of the two constituents with the drop on one's forehead, the joy arises. This is the hidden meaning.

original: 'gro ba dbang du byed pa ni bzhu bas sa //
analyzed: 'gro ba dbang du byed pa ni bzhu bas sa //
translated: The subjugation of beings is by melting, earth.

original: dgug pa'i cho ga ni bdag gis rnam par ma bshad de /
analyzed: dgug pa'i cho ga ni bdag gis rnam par ma bshad de /
translated: The rite of summoning is not explained by me,

original: chags pa dang ldan pa'i don yin pa dang / gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chags pa dang ldan pa'i don yin pa dang / gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the meaning of passion and because it is clear.

original: ro langs rtog pa 'di dag ni //
analyzed: ro langs rtog pa 'di dag ni //
translated: These are the zombie contemplations.

original: zhes pa ro'i las kyi cho ga rim pa lngar gsungs pa mang po'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ro'i las kyi cho ga rim pa lngar gsungs pa mang po'o //
translated: These are the many zombie rites taught in the five stages.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi ro bsgrub par rtog pa bsdus te bshad pa le'u lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi ro bsgrub par rtog pa bsdus te bshad pa le'u lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the fifth chapter of the Concise Explanation of the Compendium of Practice, the chapter on accomplishing the zombie.
